    • Method Detail

      • cast

        public static ServletProcessContext cast(ProcessContext processContext)

        Try to cast the given object in the instance of this class. An IllegalStateException will be thrown if the process context is null or an instance of a different class.

        Parameters:
        processContext - the process context
        Returns:
        the process context

      • getHttpServletRequest

        public HttpServletRequest getHttpServletRequest()

        Gets the wrapped request.

        Returns:
        the request

      • executeAsap

        public <T> Future<T> executeAsap(Callable<T> job)

        Executes as soon as possible the given job and returns the related Future. The method uses the AsyncContext started from the given request.

        Overrides:
        executeAsap in class ProcessContext
        Parameters:
        job - the job to execute
        Returns:
        the future result
